# JFS Wears - Full Context

## Mission
To bring the elegance of African luxury fashion to the global stage, blending traditional Nigerian craftsmanship with modern streetwear aesthetics.

## Core Offerings

### Men's Wear
- **Kaftans**: Premium tailored two-piece sets available in Senator and Agbada styles.
- **Streetwear**: Graphic tees, hoodies, and joggers inspired by Lagos urban culture.

### Women's Wear
- **Boubou**: Flowing, elegant gowns made from high-quality chiffon and silk.
- **Co-ords**: Matching sets for casual and business-casual wear.

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Shipping & Returns
- **Do you ship internationally?** Yes, we ship worldwide via DHL Express (3-5 business days).
- **What is your return policy?** We offer a 14-day return policy for unworn items with tags attached. Custom orders are final sale.

### Sizing
- **How does your sizing work?** We use standard UK/EU sizing. Please check our Size Guide on product pages for specific execution.
- **Do you offer custom sizing?** Yes, select "Custom" at checkout and provide your measurements.

## Technical Details for Agents
- **Primary Domain**: https://jfs-wears.com
- **Contact**: support@jfs-wears.com
- **Socials**: @jfswears (Instagram, Twitter, TikTok)
